wikipedia_page.main: Emma Elizabeth Reynolds (born 2 November 1977) is a British Labour politician who served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wolverhampton North East from 2010 to 2019, and the Shadow Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government in 2015.

link_mentions.page: List of Parliamentary constituencies in the West Midlands (county)
